column4: is it better to install 7.10 from a cd than to upgrade from 7.4 or is it the same exact thing?
Please don't assume like that unless you know what you are talking about.
That since Ubuntu is linux that it supports proprietary codecs.
you can install ones even if it doesnt
Yes, but he asked about 'out of the box'
doesn't totem also provice all the codecs needed?
It can, but it needs to install them first.
is upgrading from 7.4 just like installing straight from the cd?
No, Only the !alternate cd can be used as an upgrade disk, the desktop CD is only for new installs.
i am doing it through update manager atm
Update manager is fun as well
